messages.content:
Dear Voter,

My business experience & common sense are here for you! I am your LOCAL candidate from Counthorpe, not some party hack parachuted down to help boost their career. Time to deliver a thought-out Brexit that replaces Mrs. May's sell-out! Someone just like YOU to send to Westminster.

On June 8th, only a UKIP majority can make Brexit happen. With your vote, I Marietta King, will make sure the right way gets the right votes for a PROPER BREXIT.

Yours sincerely, Marietta King

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Immigration increased by more than 1 million people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Wasting Your Money on Foreign Aids
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Foreign aid spent over £12 billion a year.
The UK is still signed up, hindering extraditions and deportations.
Fishing industry access secured by European countries.
Promises made for immigrated nurses not fulfilled.
189,000 armed forces and police jobs cut since 2010.

issues.brexitEurope: On June 8th, only a UKIP majority can make Brexit happen.
issues.defence: 189,000 armed forces and police jobs cut since 2010.
issues.health: Promises made for immigrated nurses not fulfilled.
issues.immigration: Immigration increased by more than 1 million people.
